title: Spire selected to design satellite for DARPA experiment in very low orbit
summary: DARPA selected Spire Global to design a small satellite for an experiment to study high-frequency radio signals in the upper layers of the atmosphere.

title: Wyvern raises $7 million for hyperspectral imaging constellation
summary: Hyperspectral imaging startup Wyvern said Nov. 1 it secured $7 million in additional seed funds ahead of deploying its first satellites early next year.

title: Leidos selected by Northrop Grumman to supply sensor payloads for U.S. missile-tracking satellites
summary: Northrop Grumman selected Leidos to supply infrared sensor payloads for the U.S. Space Development Agency’s missile-tracking satellite constellation in low Earth orbit.

title: Space Force funds experiment on use of AI to predict satellite failures
summary: RS21, a data science startup developing artificial intelligence tools for autonomous space operations, won a U.S. Space Force contract to research the use of AI to predict satellite failures in orbit.

title: NASA Prepares to Say 'Farewell' to InSight Spacecraft
summary: A closer look at what goes into wrapping up the mission as the spacecraft’s power supply continues to dwindle.
